title: Customer Experience Practical Competency Enhancement: Research-Practice Partnership (RPP) Boundary Expansion Strategy Development

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Comparative case studies can analyze the types of boundary-expanding roles in RPP (Research-Practice Partnerships), such as institutional focus, task orientation, and professionalism.
Reflective analysis techniques can assess how power dynamics within partnerships influence boundary expansion.

Analyzing three or more public service cases provided by government agencies, learners draft an RPP (Relationship-Centered Public Service) strategy reflecting the region’s historical/cultural context within four weeks. They achieve 3.5 or higher (5-point scale) in expert review (criteria: contextual relevance, feasibility, customer-centricity).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
